subject: Mike...Re: your blog
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
I noticed that you had mentioned on your blog that you found out about  
a mod where you can add an RVG circuit to a board pin on the 
.469....Can you elaborate any more on that? The idea of using some 
sort of environmental interface for this circuit sounds intriguing, 
please keep us updated.

thanks
Andy
